item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Fixing an Elgato HD60 S HDMI capture device with the help of Ghidra (237 points | 27 comments)
2. Show HN: Void, an open-source Cursor/GitHub Copilot alternative (150 points | 65 comments)
3. Show HN: Electrico – Electron Without Node and Chrome (Rust / Wry) (57 points | 13 comments)
4. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (170 points | 70 comments)
5. Why to Not Write a Book (137 points | 80 comments)
6. FreeBSD 13.4-Release (144 points | 31 comments)
7. ChessDream, a place for chess players to improve (19 points | 2 comments)
8. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (289 points | 130 comments)
9. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (1146 points | 1277 comments)
10. rainfrog – a database management TUI for Postgres (54 points | 13 comments)
11. User-Space Interrupts (2021) (5 points | discuss)
12. 47-year-old Voyager 1 fired up thrusters it hasn't used in decades (123 points | 46 comments)
13. Franzelio: Draw Lines. Make Music. Share Your Instrument (82 points | 31 comments)
14. Bionicle – my actual part in its origins (2015) (37 points | 10 comments)
15. Nyxpsi – A Next-Gen Network Protocol for Extreme Packet Loss (126 points | 51 comments)
16. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (175 points | 8 comments)
17. K340A: The Brain Computer of Chernobyl Duga Radar [video] (128 points | 31 comments)
18. Titan Submersible Marine Board of Investigation (65 points | 22 comments)
19. Mecanum Wheel (51 points | 22 comments)
20. We fine-tuned an LLM to triage and fix insecure code (38 points | 30 comments)
21. Dissecting the gzip format (2011) (56 points | 15 comments)
22. Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump (137 points | 60 comments)
23. Stepwise selection of variables in regression is Evil (8 points | discuss)
24. The Pragmatic Programmer for Machine Learning (144 points | 21 comments)
25. Michigan Micro Mote (M3) makes history as the smallest computer (2015) (24 points | 4 comments)
26. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (231 points | 153 comments)
27. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (395 points | 275 comments)
28. How to succeed in MrBeast production (Leaked PDF) (1962 points | 1264 comments)
29. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (145 points | 32 comments)
30. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (193 points | 36 comments)
